widget.name: BBc Weather App
widget.description: BBc weather is a minimalist weather app that makes it easy to accesss weather conditions for any citiy in the world and it also gives upto date weather news/reports from BBc. Features - Automatically get weather for your current city - 4 day weather Forecast -Search Weather for any city in the world - Read the latest Tweets from @bbcweather -Follow weather topics such as Tornadoes,Floods disaster e.t.c please note this app is not from bbc
widget.author: Donnie Ibiyemi
